divs: sighting detailswe were on the patio after veiwing fireworks and shooting a few of our the whole neighborhood was out side shooting fireworks apx 1hr latet these huge orangey gold objects with glowing pulsating objects heading towards chicago from the sw. moved sloely in a triangle formation while smaller diamond colored\lit object came from different areas were like all over at different speeds and altitudes. moved with formation. there was far off in the distance up in the sky a large brite object also. we were in shock and watched the objects as they went over the gary international airport heading towards chicago
